jewelry.name: Binding Light
jewelry.htmlTooltip:
Binding Light
Binds when picked up
Unique
Trinket
Requires Level 80
Item Level 232
Equip: Restores 57 mana per 5 sec.
Use: Each time you cast a helpful spell, you gain 66 spell power. Stacks up to 8 times. Entire effect lasts 20 sec. (2 minutes cooldown)
Sell Price: 11 39 40
